summary: A 4k re-texture of jmenarus Seraphine armor
descriptionHtml:
This is just a 4k re-texture of jmenarus Serphine armor.

Although this is an original texture I did make it while trying to remain true to the source material,
that having been said jmenaru deserves complete credit for the original armor.


Said original armor is required for this mod and I've included it's adress below as well as the adresses for all
the conversions I could find. Enjoy!!!!

[youtube]2RWEHvKC6Po[/youtube] [youtube]JJFHSCESq5w[/youtube]


Original(required)
